author: jstrachan
msg: added a test case to check we can configure the keepAlive and tcpNoDelay properties on TCP. For background see: http://www.nabble.com/Bad-AMQ-Linux-performance-tf2159490.html#a5986085

author: jmsnell
msg: There is no sane reason for atom:icon and atom:logo elements to use javascript or mailto
links.  Have the getLogo() and getIcon() methods return a null if either of these schemes
are used.  getLogoElement() and getIconElement() continue to work as before.

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed the potentiol hang if a clien send an invalid DN. Now a
correct Response is send, with an error in LdapResult. This will fix

author: jmsnell
msg: Don't allow javascript: or mailto: uris to be used in xml:base
Add utility methods to URIHelper for detecting javascript and mailto URIs
